Styles

    Wine Styles

    • Bubbly

      Body: Lowest

      Fruitiness: Medium-Low (Champagne) to Medium-High (Prosecco)

      Sweetness: Medium-High

      Acidity: Medium-High to Highest

    • Cabernet Sauvignon

      Body: Full Bodied

      Fruitiness: Medium-High

      Tannin: Medium-High

      Acidity: Medium

    • Chardonnay

      Body: Medium-High

      Fruitiness: Medium-High

      Sweetness: Very Low

      Acidity: Medium

    • Malbec

      Body: Medium-High

      Fruitiness: Highest

      Tannin: Medium

      Acidity: Medium-Low

    • Merlot

      Body: Medium

      Fruitiness: Medium-High

      Tannin: Medium-High

      Acidity: Medium

    • Pinot Grigio

      Body: Very Low

      Fruitiness: Medium-Low

      Sweetness: Medium-Low

      Acidity: Medium

    • Pinot Noir

      Body: Medium-High

      Fruitiness: Medium-High

      Tannin: Medium to Low

      Acidity: Medium-High

    • Red Blends

      Body:

      Fruitiness:

      Acidity:

    • Riesling

      Body: Medium to Low

      Fruitiness: High

      Sweetness: Medium

      Acidity: High

    • Ros√©

      Body: Medium

      Fruitiness: Medium-High

      Sweetness: Medium-High

      Acidity: Medium-Low

    • Sauvignon Blanc

      Body: Medium-Low

      Fruitiness: High

      Sweetness: Very Low

      Acidity: High

    • Syrah

      Body: Full

      Fruitiness: Medium-High

      Tannin: Medium

      Acidity: Medium-High

    • Zinfandel

      Body: Full

      Fruitiness: High

      Tannin: Medium

      Acidity: Medium-Low
